document.full_text: executives of massey energy co believed president barack obama had a secret agenda to bring down the coal company after 29 men were killed in an accident at one of its mines last year, a lawsuit shows.
document.title: obama was out to destroy coal miner massey: lawsuit
lines_and_colors: executives of massey energy co believed president barack obama had a secret agenda to bring down the coal company after 29 men were killed in an accident at one of its mines last year, a lawsuit shows.
